description: This file defines the PermissionsClient class, which is a wrapper around gRPC stubs for interacting with the OttPermissions permission service. It provides methods to enumerate, get, grant, revoke, set, delete permissions, and perform authorization and registration related operations for applications via remote RPC calls. The class includes constructors for setting up the client with different credential configurations, and internally manages gRPC channels and stubs.

classes.name: PermissionsClient
classes.description: A client class for interacting with OttPermissions gRPC service to manage application permissions remotely.

methods.name: PermissionsClient
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the client with endpoint and authentication options.

methods.name: ~PermissionsClient
methods.description: Destructor for cleaning up the client.

methods.name: EnumeratePermissions
methods.description: Requests a list of permissions for an application, filtered by optional criteria.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the ApplicationPermissions object for a specified app.

methods.name: Grant
methods.description: Grants specified permissions and bundles to an application.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets/replaces the permissions for an application.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes specified permissions and bundles from an application.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes all permissions associated with an application.

methods.name: Authorize
methods.description: Checks if a session token has certain permissions.

methods.name: GetAllForApp
methods.description: Retrieves all permission entries for a specified app.

methods.name: GetAllAppKeys
methods.description: Retrieves all app keys known to the permission service.

methods.name: GetThorTokenRPC
methods.description: Acquires a Thor token for a specific app and content provider.

methods.name: RegisterPermissions
methods.description: Registers new permissions into the catalog.

methods.name: DeleteRegisteredPermission
methods.description: Removes a permission from the catalog.

methods.name: ApplyDeadline
methods.description: Applies a deadline to a gRPC client context based on configured timeout.
